mapper.select: select state from order_state_trace_info where order_id=#{orderId}

SELECT b.driver_name AS driverName, b.mobile AS driverTel, a.content AS reassignmentApplyReason, a.state as state, d.car_license AS carLicense, d.car_type AS carType FROM order_state_trace_info a LEFT JOIN driver_info b ON a.create_by = b.driver_id LEFT JOIN order_info c ON c.order_id = a.order_id LEFT JOIN car_info d ON d.car_id = c.car_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.state ='S270' order by a.create_time desc limit 1
SELECT state AS state, content AS content FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT CASE state WHEN 'S100' THEN '已提交用车申请' WHEN 'S200' THEN '已提交用车申请' WHEN 'S299' THEN '派车成功' WHEN 'S279' THEN '派车成功' WHEN 'S270' THEN '已提交改派申请' WHEN 'S277' THEN '改派驳回' ELSE '其他' END AS optType, b.nick_name AS optUserName, a.create_time AS optDate FROM order_state_trace_info a LEFT JOIN ecmp_user b ON a.create_by = b.user_id WHERE a.state IN ( 'S100', 'S200', 'S299', 'S270', 'S277', 'S279' ) AND order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY a.create_time

SELECT messageId,messageType,'改派' messageTypeStr,count(*) messageCount from ( select order_id as messageId,3 as messageType from order_info where order_id in (select order_id from order_state_trace_info where state=#{state}) and driver_id=#{driverId} and state='S900' ) a group by a.messageType

select user_id userId,nick_name userName ,phonenumber userPhone from ecmp_user where user_id =(SELECT create_by from order_state_trace_info where order_id=#{orderId} and find_in_set(state,#{states}) order by create_time desc limit 1)

SELECT a.state as state,a.order_id as orderId FROM order_state_trace_info a LEFT JOIN order_info b ON a.order_id = b.order_id WHERE b.journey_id = #{jouneyId} AND a.state IN ( 'S900', 'S901', 'S911', 'S921' ) ORDER BY a.create_time LIMIT 1

SELECT a.state as state,a.order_id as orderId,a.content FROM order_state_trace_info a LEFT JOIN order_info b ON a.order_id = b.order_id WHERE b.power_id = #{powerId} AND a.state IN ( 'S900', 'S901', 'S911', 'S921', 'S930' ) ORDER BY a.create_time desc LIMIT 1
where order_id=#{orderId} order by trace_id desc limit 1
SELECT create_by as userId FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND (state = 'S299' OR state = 'S930') LIMIT 1

select state as state,content as content,create_by as createBy,create_time as createTime from order_state_trace_info where state in ('S279','S299') and order_id=#{orderId} order by create_time limit 1

select state as state,content as content,create_by as createBy,create_time as createTime from order_state_trace_info where state in ('S277','S279','S299') and order_id=#{orderId} order by create_time desc limit 1
SELECT create_by FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND state = #{state} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
select s.create_by from order_state_trace_info s where s.state in('S299','S200') and s.order_id=#{orderId} limit 1

select a.trace_id traceId,a.order_id orderId,if(a.state='S270',1,2) type, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%m月%d日 %H:%i') time, a.state,a.content, if(a.state='S270',c.driver_name,b.nick_name) userName, if(a.state='S270',c.mobile,b.phonenumber) userPhone, CASE a.state when 'S270' then '已提交申请' when 'S277' then '审批驳回' when 'S279' then '审批通过' else '' end result from order_state_trace_info a left join ecmp_user b on (b.user_id=a.create_by and a.state in ('S277','S279') ) left join driver_info c on (c.driver_id=a.create_by and a.state = 'S270' ) where find_in_set(a.state,#{state}) and a.order_id=#{orderId} ORDER BY trace_id asc
mapper.delete: delete from order_state_trace_info where order_id=#{orderId} and state not in ('S000','S100')
mapper.select: select count(0) from order_state_trace_info a where find_in_set(a.state,#{state}) and a.order_id=#{orderId}

where order_id=#{orderId} and state='S699' AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') order by trace_id DESC limit 1 )

SELECT COUNT(1) totalTimes,SUM( CASE WHEN ji.use_time IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(ji.use_time,SIGNED) END ) AS totalDays,SUM( CASE WHEN osi.amount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE osi.amount END ) AS totalFee FROM order_state_trace_info os LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON os.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON ji.journey_id = oi.journey_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON ji.user_id = eu.user_id LEFT JOIN order_settling_info osi ON osi.order_id = os.order_id WHERE os.state = 'S900' AND eu.dept_id = #{deptId} AND (DATE_FORMAT(os.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'));

SELECT totalDays,totalFee,deptName,IF(totalDays IS NULL AND deptName IS NULL AND totalFee IS NULL AND totalTimes = 0,NULL,totalTimes) totalTimes FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) totalTimes, -- 累计用车次数 SUM( CASE WHEN ji.use_time IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(ji.use_time,SIGNED) END ) AS totalDays, -- 累计用车天数 SUM( CASE WHEN osi.amount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE osi.amount END ) AS totalFee, -- 累计用车费用 cgi.car_group_name AS deptName -- 车队名字 FROM order_state_trace_info os LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON os.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON ji.journey_id = oi.journey_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON ji.user_id = eu.user_id LEFT JOIN order_settling_info osi ON osi.order_id = os.order_id LEFT JOIN car_group_driver_relation cgdr ON cgdr.driver_id = oi.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi ON cgi.car_group_id = cgdr.car_group_id WHERE os.state = 'S900' AND eu.dept_id = #{deptId} AND (DATE_FORMAT(os.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) and cgi.car_group_id = #{carGroupId} ORDER BY deptName) a
